thread.title: Good stay at Hotel Brady -
thread.title_full: Good stay at Hotel Brady - Review of Hotel Brady Gare de L'Est, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Georgiana P
title: Good stay at Hotel Brady -
text:
The room very tiny but beautiful. I was there with my mom, for us was enough but i don't know if for a couple it will be ok.
It could be cleaner, but it was nice.
The persons working at the hotel were nice. Just one thing, we should leave the key at the front desk when leaving and one day when we returned, it was raining a lot and stayed there on front of the hotel for somebody to open the front door, which was not cool at all. But i recommend this hotel if you ever go to paris. The zone is very nice, nearby the center. Cool
